columns.RoomId: The unique identifier for each room in the hotel.
columns.roomName: The descriptive name of the room in the hotel.
columns.beds: The number of beds available in the room.
columns.bedType: The type of bed present in the room.
columns.maxOccupancy: The maximum number of guests allowed in the room.
columns.basePrice: The starting price for booking the room per night.
columns.decor: The style or theme of the room's interior design.

Rooms.table_description: The table lists all available hotel rooms with features and pricing.

columns.Code: The unique identifier for each reservation made by guests.
columns.Room: The identifier for the room being reserved.
columns.CheckIn: The date when the guest checks into the hotel.
columns.CheckOut: The date when the guest checks out of the hotel.
columns.Rate: The nightly rate charged for the room reserved.
columns.LastName: The last name of the guest making the reservation.
columns.FirstName: The first name of the guest making the reservation.
columns.Adults: The number of adult guests included in the reservation.
columns.Kids: The number of children included in the reservation.

Reservations.table_description: The table stores details of guest reservations at the hotel.
